LicenseClientEventProperties | Methods
 
Packagecom.nitrolm
Classpublic class LicenseClientEvent
InheritanceLicenseClientEvent flash.events.Event

The LicenseClientEvent is used to send response codes and data from the NitroLM server. The best practice for using events is to remove your event handler inside the method handling the event.


Public Properties
 PropertyDefined By
  data : *
Any data retrieved in the NitroLM call will be stored here.

  LICENSE_RESPONSE : String = licenseResponse
[static] Handle this response type for all requests except for change password and modifying the usage counter.
